title: Chaland Anthology #1: Freddy Lombard
description: Freddy Lombard and friends go on four adventures spanning Belgian castles and African jungles from this Eisner Award-nominated creator! These classic stories exhibit the elegant design that made Chaland a legend among cartoonists and animators worldwide. First volume of the acclaimed series by European "ligne claire" legend Yves Chaland.
author: Yves Chaland
